text: Bogaraš (, Hungarian: Bogaras or Karjad-Gádorfalu) is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Senta municipality, in the North Banat District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Hungarian ethnic majority (80.11%) with a present Romani minority (12.43%) and its population numbering 724 people (2002 census). ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina ==External links== *History of Bogaraš Category:Places in Bačka Category:Senta
title: Bogaraš (Senta)
